article: the opposition kuomintang -lrb- kmt -rrb- will present the government a set of suggestions on ways of boosting the faltering economy as a gesture to support president chen shui-bian 's call to `` fight for the economy , '' a kmt official said wednesday .
abstract: kmt to offer advice on economy to government
